Class PokerDice

  • public class PokerDice
extends java.lang.Object
    Description: This class takes care of all the functions and calculations for the PokerDice Game

    4/17/18

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkChance()
      update the score with the sum of all dice
      void checkFiveOfAKind()
      update the score if the dice currently include a five of a kind
      void checkFourOfAKind()
      update the score if the dice currently include a four-of-a-kind
      void checkFullHouse()
      update the score if the dice currently include a full house
      void checkLargeStraight()
      update the score if the dice currently include a large straight
      void checkSingles(int val)
      update the score by adding all dice with the value of val
      void checkSmallStraight()
      update the score if the dice currently include a small straight
      void checkThreeOfAKind()
      update the score if the dice currently include a three of a kind.
      boolean gameOver()
      Return true if the game is over Otherwise, return false
      int getBonusScore()
      Return 35 or 0 if bonus reaches 63
      java.util.ArrayList<GVdie> getDice()
      Return the ArrayList of GVdie
      int getScore()
      Returns the current score
      boolean okToRoll()
      Return true if it is legal to roll the dice Otherwise, return false There are only three rolls per round
      void resetGame()
      set instance variables to zero and all dice to blank
      void rollDice()
      increment the number of rolls and roll each of the dice that are not currently held.
      void setDice(int[] values)
